translations.en:
: ** :thermometer: In this period when temperatures exceed 90Â°F, you get tired, so you decide to look for a way to relax and get back in shape. 

:mag: Search the surroundings for a body of water
:deciduous_tree: Rest at the foot of a tree
:sleeping: Rest right here

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
